info.name: Mattermost combo left sidebar
info.description: Stack the team and channel sidebars vertically instead of side-by-side to make more horizontal space for content and allow unabbreviated team names. Requires the "Mattermost kompact" style sheet.
info.additionalInfo:
Updated 2017-06-22 to raise channel sidebar on hover, in case team sidebar obscures part of it
Updated 2017-06-21 to make heights adaptive
